title: LF Plat+ top, and support for ranked 5s
body:
Hi everyone my name is Shia LaRedBuff and i am the OCE manager for The community Tenacity.
Tenacity is looking to create a third OCE team and to do so we need to fill the roles of Top and Support.
as the team is full off mostly high plats and low diamonds i would like to try and keep it to being a plat and above team 
please apply at the forums at this website http://tenacitygaming.com/forums/topic/ranked-team-recruitment/page/6/#post-1664 
if you have any questions feel free to add me in game. 
thanks for reading and and hope to see you in the community soon
